the apple thing. so there are a couple things. you could certainly generate fake xinput events, but its more traditional to figure out what batch process you want to do and then determine what the underlying tool is to do it. so if you are manipulating images with a photo tool, then you would use imagemagick
so in the case you are describing you would use curl or wget to download the files
you can hand wget a list of urls and it can download all of them. wget can crawl websites and mirror the whole thing if you want
